reviews.text: Was driving through and stopped on the offchance. It's convenient to the Capitol Reef NP, and is set in attractive surroundings with farmland next door. The only non-smoking room they had was a kitchenette, which was more than I needed, but very large. Although the fixtures were on the elderly side, it was clean, comfy, and the road is quiet at night, so good for sleeping. There is a large, smart conservatory-type indoor pool extension, and although I didn't have time to try it, judging by the happy sounds coming from other guests it was proving popular.
reviews.title: Nice quiet stopover

reviews.text: I ate at the diner next door, and was well looked after: clean and not expensive.
reviews.title: We expected more....
An okay Cheap Sleep
reviews.text: For the $50+tax I thought it was very good value, and would happily stay there again.

reviews.title: Not too bad for the money.
reviews.text: A relative of ours suggested the Aquarius Motel for our visit to Capitol Reef. They said that it was old, but clean. We were initially impressed with the friendly greeting, however the Kitchenette Suite did not live up to expectations. On the surface, it looked clean. However, we found that it wasn't very clean at all. We even found mouse poop in two of the three beds! When we brought this to the management's attention, only a half-hearted apology was given. If you owned a motel, wouldn't you at least offer another room or some other type of concession? We half expected them to at least offer a discount in the price when we checked out, but all they said was: "It sometimes happens!" Maybe management of this motel should double-check the rooms before the guests arrive? On the other hand, our kids did enjoy the pool.

reviews.title: Family Owned Motel
reviews.text: Traveling in Autumn, 2004, my sister and I stayed here. We had a large room with 2 Queen beds, TV, frig., microwave, phone, one room with sink and another with toilet and shower. It was good value. But SKIP the Aquarius Cafe! It was awful. (See under restaurants)
